definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be or become, many, much (NH [[רַב]] esp. lord, master, [[רַבִּי]] my master teacher; MI:5 adj. pl. [[רבן]]; Ph [[רב]] f. [[רבת]]; As. [rabâbu], rabbu; Ar. rab=a rear, increase (act.; rub=un thick juice, cf. NH [[רְבָב]] grease is thought by Buhl al. to indicate original mng. be thick), rab=un lord, owner, master; Sab. [[רב]] esp. in n. pr., [[רבאל]], [[רבבם]] [[רבשמסם]], etc., CIS:iv,nos-285. 3; 286,1; 287,12, etc.; Lihy. [[רבה]] its lord DHM:Epigr.Denkm.Ar.232; Eth rababa: expund, spread (intrans.); Aram. [[רַב]] rab great, chief, so OAram. Nab. Palm. [[רב]], LZb:366 Cook:107);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 fs. consec. [[וְרַבָּה]] Ex 23:29, Is 6:12, [[רָָבָּה]] Ge 18:20 (Ho 9:7 rd. [[וְרׂב הַמּשְׂטֵמָה]] [for MT ´[[וְרַבָּה מ]]:] LXX. We Now); elsewh. only 3 pl. [[רַבּוּ]] 1Sa 25:10+, [[רָָבּוּ]] Je 46:23+2 t. [other forms supplied by [[רבה]] q.v.]; Inf.cstr [[רׂב]] Ge 6:1, Jos 9:13, Le 25:16 (‖[[מְעׂט ]]), sf. [[רֻבְּכֶם]] De 7:7, and perh. [[רֻבָּם]] Ho 4:7 (cf. [[רׂב]] infr.);—

be (become) many, pers. Ge 6:1 (J) Ex 23:29 (E; v.supr.), 1Sa 25:10, Ho 4:7 (perh.), Is 66:16, Ps 3:2, Ps 25:19, Ps 38:20, Ec 5:10+ [[מִן]] comp. Je 46:23, De 7:7, Ps 69:5; of things Is 22:9, Ps 4:8, 104:24, years Le 25:16(P), sins Je 5:6, Je 14:7, Is 59:12, Job 35:6 .
become great, Ge 18:20 (J) Is 6:12; be long, of journey, Jos 9:13—
